mng: along, to follow (a line, tradition etc), to carry on, to trim (a border with braid, tape etc), border, edge

exm.mng: to carry on as before, to follow (an old custom etc)
front-line, forward position, outpost, extending ahead, frontier (of science, technology etc)
along the way, the duration of a journey
to continue to use (old methods), to apply as before, according to usage
along the sides of the road, by the wayside
along the river, the region around the river
along the line (e.g. railway), the region near the line
